tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodegradable_waste_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  waste_category VARCHAR(50),
  waste_quantity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementCompanies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(150),
    contact_person VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE biodegradable_waste (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(100),
  date_collected DATE,
  weight DECIMAL,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_sites (
  site_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(200),
  manager_name VARCHAR(100),
  capacity DECIMAL,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id UUID,
  collection_date DATE,
  collected_by VARCHAR(100),
  waste_weight DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  site_id UUID,
  compliance_rating VARCHAR(50),
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_history (
  report_id INT,
  regulation_id INT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  CONSTRAINT fk_report_id FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES biodegradable_waste_compliance(report_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_regulation_id FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES regulations(regulation_id)
);
